Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Osm-pepA (a fragment of osmotin, synthetic AMPs20, XXA, UCLL1c; Osm-pepB: inactive)

Literature Information.Literature: APD analysis reveals that the sequence of this peptide shows poor similarity (35.5%) tofrog Brevinin-1ISa. Mol Wt:  3045.469; GRAVY: -0.88.Activity: This fragment is active against S. cerevisiae (MIC 40 uM) and P. pastoris (MIC 20 uM). Note that Osm-pepB (seq: GGVWNLNVNPGTTGARVWARTK) showed antifungal activity (MIC>127 uM). Updated 7/2021
Literature Information.Author: Falcao LL, Silva-Werneck JO, de R Ramos A, Martins NF, Bresso E, Rodrigues MA, Bemquerer MP, Marcellino LH.
Literature Information.Title: Antimicrobial properties of two novel peptides derived from Theobroma cacao osmotin
